about.part_1: PHP developer for more than 10 years and Symfony developer since its version 1.3, I had the opportunity to work with large companies (Renault, Accor, My Money Bank, AXA, Cardif, Maif).
about.part_2: I accompanied and raised in competence, by my expertise, several tens of developers.
about.part_3: I am able to start an application from scratch or to take over an existing one to make it evolve. I can also set up a continuous deployment system.
